original: bod skad du /
analyzed: bod skad du /

analyzed: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bstod pa /
translated: Praise of Noble Avalokite≈õvara

original: 'jig rten mgon po la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: 'jig rten mgon po la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to the Lord of the World!

original: 'jig rten bla ma srid pa gsum gyis bstod pa po //
analyzed: 'jig rten bla ma srid pa gsum gyis bstod pa po //
translated: The one praised by the three worlds, the Guru of the world,

original: lha yi gtso bo bdud dang tshangs pas bstod pa po //
analyzed: lha yi gtso bo bdud dang tshangs pas bstod pa po //
translated: The one praised by the chief gods, MƒÅra and BrahmƒÅ,

original: thub pa'i rgyal mchog bstod pas grub par mdzad pa po //
analyzed: thub pa'i rgyal mchog bstod pas grub par mdzad pa po //
translated: The one who grants accomplishment through praise to the supreme king of sages,

original: 'jig rten gsum gyi mgon po mchog la phyag 'tshal lo //üîΩbde gshegs dpag med sku mchog sku bzang 'dzin pa po//
analyzed: 'jig rten gsum gyi mgon po mchog la phyag 'tshal lo // bde gshegs dpag med sku mchog sku bzang 'dzin pa po//
translated: I pay homage to the supreme protector of the three worlds.üîΩThe one who holds the supreme body of immeasurable bliss,

original: bde gshegs snang mtha' yas kyi dbu rgyan 'dzin pa po //
analyzed: bde gshegs snang mtha' yas kyi dbu rgyan 'dzin pa po //
translated: The one who holds the crown of AmitƒÅbha, the Sugata,

original: phyag g-yas mchog sbyin yi dags bkres skom sel ba po //
analyzed: phyag g-yas mchog sbyin yi dags bkres skom sel ba po //
translated: The one with the supreme generosity in the right hand, dispelling the hunger and thirst of pretas,

original: g-yon pa'i phyag ni gser gyi padmos brgyan pa po //
analyzed: g-yon pa'i phyag ni gser gyi padmos brgyan pa po //
translated: The one adorned with a golden lotus in the left hand,

original: dri zhim ral ba'i phreng ba dmar ser 'khyug pa po //
analyzed: dri zhim ral ba'i phreng ba dmar ser 'khyug pa po //
translated: The one with reddish-brown curling locks of fragrant hair,

original: zhal ras rgyas pa zla ba lta bur mdzes pa po //
analyzed: zhal ras rgyas pa zla ba lta bur mdzes pa po //
translated: The one with a beautiful full face like the moon,

original: spyan gyi padmo mchog tu bzang zhing yangs pa po //
analyzed: spyan gyi padmo mchog tu bzang zhing yangs pa po //
translated: Your eyes are like the most excellent and wide-open lotus flowers.

original: kha ba dung ltar rnam dkar dri ngad ldang ba po //
analyzed: kha ba dung ltar rnam dkar dri ngad ldang ba po //
translated: Your teeth are as white as snow and conch shells, and give off a fragrant scent.

original: dri med 'od chags mu tig tshom bu 'dzin pa po //
analyzed: dri med 'od chags mu tig tshom bu 'dzin pa po //
translated: You hold a cluster of pearls that are radiant and spotless.

original: mdzes pa'i 'od zer skya rengs dmar po sa brgyan pa po //
analyzed: mdzes pa'i 'od zer skya rengs dmar po sa brgyan pa po //
translated: Your beautiful light is adorned with the red glow of dawn.

original: padma'i mtsho ltar phyag ni dngar bar byas pa po //
analyzed: padma'i mtsho ltar phyag ni dngar bar byas pa po //
translated: Your hands are as delightful as a lake of lotuses.

original: ston ka'i sprin gyi mdog dang ldan zhing gzhon pa po //
analyzed: ston ka'i sprin gyi mdog dang ldan zhing gzhon pa po //
translated: You have the color of an autumn cloud and are youthful.

original: rin chen mang pos dpung pa gnyis ni brgyan pa po //
analyzed: rin chen mang pos dpung pa gnyis ni brgyan pa po //
translated: Your two shoulders are adorned with many jewels.

original: lo ma'i mchog ltar phyag mthil gzhon zhing 'jam pa po //
analyzed: lo ma'i mchog ltar phyag mthil gzhon zhing 'jam pa po //
translated: The palms of your hands are as soft and tender as the best leaves.

original: ri dags pags pas nu ma g-yon pa bkab pa po //
analyzed: ri dags pags pas nu ma g-yon pa bkab pa po //
translated: You cover your left breast with the skin of a deer.

original: snyan cha gdu bus sgeg cing rgyan rnams 'chang ba po //
analyzed: snyan cha gdu bus sgeg cing rgyan rnams 'chang ba po //
translated: You are charming with earrings and bracelets, and wear ornaments.

original: dri ma med pa'i padmo'i mchog la gnas pa po //
analyzed: dri ma med pa'i padmo'i mchog la gnas pa po //
translated: You dwell on the supreme, spotless lotus.

original: lte ba'i ngos ni padma'i 'dab ltar 'jam pa po //
analyzed: lte ba'i ngos ni padma'i 'dab ltar 'jam pa po //
translated: Your navel is as smooth as a lotus leaf.

original: gser gyi rkang gdub sgra yis zhabs yid 'ong ba po //
analyzed: gser gyi rkang gdub sgra yis zhabs yid 'ong ba po //
translated: Your feet are delightful with the sound of golden anklets.

original: gser gyi ska rags mchog la nor bus spras pa po //
analyzed: gser gyi ska rags mchog la nor bus spras pa po //
translated: He is the one who wears a golden belt adorned with jewels.

original: sta zur dkris pa'i ras bzang sham thabs 'dzin pa po //
analyzed: sta zur dkris pa'i ras bzang sham thabs 'dzin pa po //
translated: He is the one who wears a fine lower robe wrapped around his hips.

original: thub pa'i mkhyen mchog mtsho chen pha rol phyin @126a * //
analyzed: thub pa'i mkhyen mchog mtsho chen pha rol phyin @126a * //
translated: He is the one who has reached the other shore of the great ocean of the Sage‚Äôs supreme wisdom.

original: pa po // mchog brnyes bsod nams mang po nye bar bsags pa po //
analyzed: pa po // mchog brnyes bsod nams mang po nye bar bsags pa po //
translated: He is the one who has accumulated much merit and attained the highest.

original: rtag tu bde ba'i 'byung gnas rga nad sel ba po //
analyzed: rtag tu bde ba'i 'byung gnas rga nad sel ba po //
translated: He is the one who is always the source of happiness and the dispeller of old age and sickness.

original: gsum thar mdzad cing mkhas spyod spyod pa ston pa po //
analyzed: gsum thar mdzad cing mkhas spyod spyod pa ston pa po //
translated: He is the one who liberates from the three and teaches the conduct of the wise.

original: lus can mchog ste bdud dpung 'khrugs las rgyal pa po //
analyzed: lus can mchog ste bdud dpung 'khrugs las rgyal pa po //
translated: He is the supreme being, the one who conquers the army of MƒÅra.

original: tshangs pa'i gnas pa bzhi yis dben par mdzad pa po //
analyzed: tshangs pa'i gnas pa bzhi yis dben par mdzad pa po //
translated: He is the one who is secluded through the four divine abodes.

original: ngang pa'i 'gros dang glang chen dregs 'drar gshegs pa po //
analyzed: ngang pa'i 'gros dang glang chen dregs 'drar gshegs pa po //
translated: He is the one who moves with the gait of a goose and the pride of an elephant.

original: tshogs kun nye bar bsags nas chos kun ston pa po //
analyzed: tshogs kun nye bar bsags nas chos kun ston pa po //
translated: He is the one who teaches all dharmas after gathering all accumulations.

original: sdug bsngal mtsho dang nyon mongs mtsho las sgrol ba po //
analyzed: sdug bsngal mtsho dang nyon mongs mtsho las sgrol ba po //
translated: He is the one who liberates from the ocean of suffering and the ocean of afflictions.

original: gang zhig rtag tu tho rangs langs nas gus pa yis //
analyzed: gang zhig rtag tu tho rangs langs nas gus pa yis //
translated: He is the one who, always rising at dawn with respect,

original: spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po yid la sems byed cing //
analyzed: spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po yid la sems byed cing //
translated: And who keeps Avalokite≈õvara in mind,

original: bstod pa'i mchog 'di dag cing gsal bar 'don byed na //
analyzed: bstod pa'i mchog 'di dag cing gsal bar 'don byed na //
translated: And recites these supreme praises clearly and distinctly,

original: de ni skyes pa'am yang na bud med yin yang rung //
analyzed: de ni skyes pa'am yang na bud med yin yang rung //
translated: Whether they are male or female,

original: skye ba 'di dang ma 'ongs skye ba thams cad du //
analyzed: skye ba 'di dang ma 'ongs skye ba thams cad du //
translated: In this life and in all future lives,

original: 'jig rten 'jig rten las 'das dgos pa kun 'grub 'gyur //
analyzed: 'jig rten 'jig rten las 'das dgos pa kun 'grub 'gyur //
translated: All their worldly and transcendent needs will be fulfilled.

original: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bstod pa /
analyzed: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bstod pa /
translated: The Praise of Noble Avalokite≈õvara

analyzed: dge slong ma dpal mos mdzad pa rdzogs so//
